title: Yasuo ultimate skin
body:
i think yasuo is one of the most successful champions in the league , he is op , so i think an ultimate skin for him would be very nice , i had an idea so i wanted to share it with u guys , the thing is i watch a lot of anime , so i thought about attack on titan and yasuo , using the 3d maneuvers gear on yasuo , the sword , etc
and using the  3d maneuvers gear on his ultimate "last breath" it would be great 
and if anyone doesn't know attack on titan , open you tube and search for levai vs the lady giant ,man that was epic

replies.body: dude you do realise copywrite exists?
he just came out with a legendary and he has hardly been out a year
OR You could get skins for zac instead of pony tail dickheads.

> [{quoted}](name=Olee,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=Y3qp8uqM,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-06-01T09:30:53.174+0000)
>
> OR Zed

No zed doesnt need MORE skins like lux and others.
Zac does need it more sure but Zed also hasn't gotten one aside from SKT in a while. And Lux is getting one, or did she already get it?
